summary: Changes the Enchanter\'s Elixir from 25% for 60 sec to 50% (up to 1000%) for 300 sec.
descriptionHtml:
Surprised no-one has thought of this....


There are several ESPs that change the Enchanter\'s Elixir from 25% for 60 sec to 50% (up to 1000%) for 300 sec. Pick only one.

The baseID is 39D12, assuming that you haven\'t installed a mod that changes the elixir\'s baseID.

Installation is easy:
1)Download the file
2)Extract the .zip folder
3)Pick the percentage you want
4)Place in Skyrim\'s Data folder
5)Start your game and/or mod manager
6)Select the ESP you chose
7)Play the game
8)Endorse :) (This step is optional, but very much appreciated)

Required:

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
v 1.4

This mod will conflict with anything that messes with the AlchFortifyEnchant effect and modifies the Enchanter\'s Elixir\'s effect.
author: The Fox of Shadows
